items.title: Greek coastguards charged over 2023 migrant shipwreck
items.description: Seventeen coastguards have been charged by a Greek naval court over the deadliest migrant boat disaster in the Mediterranean Sea for a decade.

items.title: Could Nigeria's careful ethnic balancing act be under threat?
items.description: Criticism is growing after several top positions go to members of the president's ethnic Yoruba group.

items.title: What you need to know ahead of South Korea's snap presidential election
items.description: The vote comes after the impeachment and removal of former president Yoon Suk Yeol.

items.title: Far-right marchers attack Palestinians as Israel marks taking of Jerusalem
items.description: Israeli opposition leaders condemned attacks on Palestinians as "racist" and a disgrace to Judaism.

items.title: Kremlin calls Trump 'emotional' after US president says Putin is 'crazy'
items.description: Trump said that Vladimir Putin had gone "absolutely crazy" following massive aerial attacks on Ukraine.
